title: opening | open
description:
Opening ceremony to the entire event - welcoming, introducing, information, et cetera.

open pi suno pi toki pona - kama pona pi jan ale, pana pi sona ale, en ijo ante mute.

title: Let's make ilo nanpa lili! | o pali e ilo nanpa lili!
description:
It's time for DIY! Let's learn building ilo nanpa lili on breadboard! Kits for ilo nanpa lili will be available for sale at cost price. Q&A session available at the end of this session. You can ask me about anything, related to ilo nanpa lili or not.

mi wile pali e ilo nanpa lili. sina lukin la sina ken kama sona e nasin pali. ni la sina ken esun e ijo li pali e ilo nanpa lili sina. ona li mani lili. tenpo pi kama sona li pini la sina ken toki tawa mi.

title: toki pona Gartic Phone | musi Gartic Phone pi toki pona
description:
Gartic Phone (an implementation of the game Telestrations or "paper telephone") but in Toki Pona! Write a description of an image, then draw an image of a description, and see how strange things can get!

o musi e musi Katikapon (Gartic Phone)! musi ni li kepeken e sitelen toki e sitelen musi.

title: luka pona
description:
luka pona (or LPSL) is a constructed signed language derived from toki pona and intended for usage in toki pona contexts. It borrows classifier features and storytelling devices from natural signed languages, giving it unique expressive potential. jan Lakuse transposes her original toki pona story 'tu lukin lon' into luka pona.

luka pona li toki luka pali li tawa kulupu pi toki pona. kepeken nasin pi toki luka suli, la nasin toki pona mute li lon luka pona. jan lakuse li kepeken luka pona e toki ona "tu lukin lon" tawa ni: jan li ken sona e pona namako pi luka pona.

title: A poem by any other name | toki musi pi nasin nimi ante: o sitelen!
description:
From the sound of the sonnet to the design of the diamante, there are several styles of poems in the world. This workshop will pilot a format of poetry native to Toki Pona, so come along to write and share a piece! Presentation mostly in English, jan sin welcome.

toki musi lili la, nasin sitelen mute li lon. nasin Sone li pona. nasin Sijamante li ante. a, nasin pi toki pona li seme? toki ni la, mi pana e nasin sitelen sin. jan ale li ken sitelen e toki musi kepeken nasin sin ni, li ken toki e ona! mi kepeken mute e toki Inli. jan sin li ken kama pona.

title: songs by kala pona | kalama musi pi kala pona
description:
kala pona will sing a few songs!

kala pona li kalama e kalama musi ona!

  • kule olin
  • pipi li kon
  • suno nanpa wan
  • luka sike
  • o tawa noka
  • o lape (extended | suli)

title: Hey Let's Do an Adventure!!!  | o tawa musi!!!
description:
Learn how to play a one page rpg by playing!

o kama sona musi lili!

Link

title: The Genius of Toki Pona | toki pona li nasin toki pi wawa ante
description:
a lecture The Genius of Toki Pona, explaining what it means to be the world's first speakable semantic metalanguage

nasin wan pi sona toki la jan sona li alasa e kon suli lon toki jan. toki pona li sama nasin ni! toki pona li jo e wawa ante tan ni.

title: mostly spoken word renditions of pieces written in toki pona, released or otherwise | jaki mi
description:
Program*:

  • intro
  • open
  • olin li toki tawa jan ale
  • jan lili pi ma ante
  • toki ike awen
  • toki Tokipokalama
  • mi toki pini

*: we reserve the right to change the program

mi wile e ni: mi toki la sina musi. sina musi ala la sina ken pakala e mi.

title: Codenames
description: Codenames is a popular board game about relating several words or pictures on the board by giving just one word as a hint. You can read the rules here. We will be playing in toki pona allowing two words (noun+adjective) per hint. We will use either playingcards.io or codenames.game

title: songs by kala pona | kalama musi pi kala pona
description:
kala pona will sing a couple more songs :D

kala pona li kalama sin e kalama musi ona :D

  • suno nanpa wan
  • o tawa noka
  • sina taso
  • o kute (new unreleased song! | kalama musi sin!)
  • kule olin
  • o lape

title: sitelen pona Kahoot | musi Kahoot pi sitelen pona
description:
test your sitelen pona knowledge in this kahoot against everyone else!

sina sona ala sona pona e sitelen pona? o musi e musi Kahoot tawa sona ni!

title: sona sin en sona pi sin ala
description:
News about the world and toki pona, a small documentation about the first conlang and a discussion and tier list of nasin nanpa

mi mute li toki e sona sin, e sona pi toki pali pi nanpa wan. kin la, mi mute li toki e ni: nasin nanpa seme li pona?

title: music by jan Pensa | kalama musi pi jan Pensa
description:
Singing songs in Toki Pona, accompanied by ukulele.

mi kalama musi kepeken toki pona.

Will include | kalama musi ni en kalama musi ante li lon:

  • o sona e mi (Remember Me)
  • tawa Panpa (La Bamba)
  • soweli mute (Dek Bovinoj)

title: break
Applying language change to Toki Pona | mi ante e toki pona
description:
A video description of the tpka concept, and my implementation of it.

kon pi sitelen tawa li ni: toki pi kama ante li lon. mi pali e toki sama ni.

title: My exprience in Toki Pona communites | ijo pi kulupu pi toki pona
description:
My exprience about Toki Pona in Korean community and ma pona

mi toki e ijo pi toki pona lon kulupu pi toki pona

title: toki pona Drawful | musi Drawful
description:
A game of toki pona Drawful 2!

mi ale li musi e musi Drawful pi toki pona!

the perfect tokirap [epiku] | nimi ale lon toki pona [epiku]
description:
creating the tokirap (you know, like the pokerap, but with toki pona words instead of pokemon)

mi pali e kalama musi pi nimi ale lon toki pona

title: musi Quiplash kepeken toki pona
description:
We play a game of Quiplash 2 with custom prompts in toki pona. The participants attempt to interpret the toki pona prompts into English in humorous ways. The participants must be sufficiently proficient in toki pona to participate.

mi ali o musi e musi Quiplash kepeken toki pi toki pona. jan li alasa ante e toki pi toki pona tawa toki musi pi toki Inli. jan musi o ken kepeken pona e toki pona.

jackbox.tv

description:
luka pona (or LPSL) is a constructed signed language derived from toki pona and intended for usage in toki pona contexts. It borrows classifier features and storytelling devices from natural signed languages, giving it unique expressive potential. jan Lakuse transposes her original toki pona story 'tu lukin lon' into luka pona.

title: A poem by any other name | toki musi pi nasin nimi ante: o sitelen!
description:
From the sound of the sonnet to the design of the diamante, there are several styles of poems in the world. This workshop will pilot a format of poetry native to Toki Pona, so come along to write and share a piece! Presentation mostly in English, jan sin welcome.

toki musi lili la, nasin sitelen mute li lon. nasin Sone li pona. nasin Sijamante li ante. a, nasin pi toki pona li seme? toki ni la, mi pana e nasin sitelen sin. jan ale li ken sitelen e toki musi kepeken nasin sin ni, li ken toki e ona! mi kepeken mute e toki Inli. jan sin li ken kama pona.

title: Intermediate Toki Pona: Building from jan Misali's Twelve Days | sona namako lon sitelen tawa sona pi jan Misali
description:
jan Misali's 12 days of toki pona is the most popular beginner's course for learning toki pona. Fast paced with catchy music and entertaining delivery, it provides many with a workable foundation in the language. In this lecture, jan Lakuse strives to solidify this foundation with an in-depth review of intermediate to advanced toki pona grammar.

jan Misali li pali e sitelen tawa "sona pi toki pona" la jan sin mute li kepeken. ona li pona mute a tawa kulupu. sitelen tawa li toki ala e ijo la jan lakuse li lukin pana e sona ni tawa jan sin.

description:

musi ni la jan wan li sitelen e sitelen tan nimi. jan ante li lukin sona/toki e sitelen

title: break
finale | pini
description:
A grand finale and wrap-up to the event! Thanking, credits, support, and a secret item :)

pini pi suno pi toki pona! pana pona tawa jan lukin ale, pana pi sona pi jan pana ale, linja tawa lipu pi jan pana ale, ijo pi sona ala :)
